name: Black Diamond Ultralight Ice Screw
description: Shave weight to go fast. These ice crews have aluminum tubes and hangers to keep the grams down, and steel drilling tips to ensure long-lasting bite. The wiregate Express handle further drops weight and is colour-coded so you'll grab the right length screw every time.Ultralight aluminum hangers and tubes with stainless steel drilling tips helps keep weight down.Second clip-in point makes swapping positions at belays more efficient.Lightweight wiregate Express handle is colour-coded for easy identification.Large crank knob for a fast placements and uninterrupted 360-degree motion.
